place.name: ABERWHEELER
place.gazetteerText: ABERCWHILER, a township in Bodfary parish, Denbighshire; at the confluence of the Cwhiler and the Clwyd, 3½ miles NE of Denbigh. Acres, 3,346. Pop., 430. Houses, 99. Here is a Calvinistic Methodist chapel. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
